text: Update the installation parameters in the file install.xml to suit the local installation. The following subsections contain listings of all the installation parameters within the install.xml file, including example and/or default values. This section has the following subsections: Installer Properties for Platform Properties for PostgreSQL Additional Platform Properties in install.xml Properties for Oracle Properties for SAP HANA
title: Updating the Installation Properties for Platform - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
